details: Developed and maintained the frontend for multiple projects as a solo JavaScript developer, ensuring high-quality user experiences and responsive designs.
Designed and implemented two interactive dashboards: one for client use, providing insights and analytics, and another for internal operations, enhancing team productivity and collaboration.
Created a customizable chatbot SDK that can be seamlessly embedded into client applications and websites, improving user engagement and support capabilities.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver solutions that meet client needs and align with business objectives.
Utilized modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries to enhance application performance and maintainability.
Conducted user testing and gathered feedback to iterate on designs and improve functionality, resulting in increased user satisfaction.
Resolved issues to improve system stability and performance.
Contributed to maintaining and improving key projects, ensuring reliability and efciency.
Identied and addressed bottlenecks to optimize application functionality.
Developed and maintained client-side code to ensure functionality and improve user experience.
Converted Figma designs into Angular interfaces with attention to detail.
Optimized front-end performance and accessibility, following industry standards.
Managed form creation for KYC projects, improving data collection and processing.
Wrote 300+ unit tests with Jest to improve code reliability.
Participated in Agile CI/CD processes to support sprints and deployments.
Maintained and updated website content to ensure accuracy and relevance for a local delivery
Managed packages and dependencies on Linux for optimized system operation.
Conducted regular maintenance and performance tuning for server environments.
